scripts.//start:comment: Start both frontend (Angular) and backend (Nest.js) servers simultaneously
scripts.//start:frontend:comment: Start only the Angular frontend on http://localhost:4200
scripts.//start:backend:comment: Start only the Nest.js backend on http://localhost:3000/api
scripts.//build:comment: Build both apps for production with parallel execution
scripts.//build:frontend:comment: Build Angular frontend with production optimizations
scripts.//build:backend:comment: Build Nest.js backend with production optimizations
scripts.build:dev: nx run-many -t build -p backend frontend --configuration development --watch
scripts.//build:dev:comment: Build both apps in development mode with file watching for auto-rebuild
scripts.//test:comment: Run unit tests for both frontend and backend
scripts.//test:frontend:comment: Run Jest tests for Angular frontend only
scripts.//test:backend:comment: Run Jest tests for Nest.js backend only
scripts.//test:watch:comment: Run tests in watch mode - re-runs tests on file changes
scripts.//testall:comment: Run all tests across the entire monorepo with code coverage reports
scripts.//lint:comment: Run ESLint on all projects in the workspace
scripts.//lint:frontend:comment: Run ESLint on Angular frontend only
scripts.//lint:backend:comment: Run ESLint on Nest.js backend only
scripts.//e2e:comment: Run Cypress end-to-end tests for the frontend
scripts.//e2e:backend:comment: Run Jest E2E tests for the backend API
scripts.//affected:apps:comment: Show which applications are affected by current code changes
scripts.//affected:libs:comment: Show which libraries are affected by current code changes
scripts.//affected:build:comment: Build only projects affected by recent changes (optimizes CI/CD)
scripts.//affected:test:comment: Test only projects affected by recent changes
scripts.//affected:lint:comment: Lint only projects affected by recent changes
scripts.//affected:e2e:comment: Run E2E tests only for affected projects
scripts.//affected:graph:comment: Visualize dependency graph highlighting affected projects
scripts.//format:comment: Auto-format all code files using Prettier (writes changes to disk)
scripts.//format:check:comment: Check if code is properly formatted without making changes
scripts.//graph:comment: Open interactive visual dependency graph of the workspace
scripts.//dep-graph:comment: Alias for graph command - shows project dependencies
scripts.//reset:comment: Clear Nx cache to force fresh builds and tests
scripts.//update:comment: Update Nx workspace to latest version and generate migration scripts
